name: Returned Drifter
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Unreadable Face
entries: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Sling
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.
